title: Bug 37021 - Source path wrong in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path wrong in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. See tests/new/binaryWarnings/.. for code to run to reproduce the problem. Limitations of the tests: These tests return false positives when detecting this error because filename checking is not enabled in harness verification of messages. I encountered this issue in AJDT. When the filename makes no sense to AJDT, AJDT simply omits it.
EB: In the declare warning messages, when targeting .class files from injars, the source path is listed in the incorrect format 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main.class'.
SR:
1. Open the project in AJDT.
2. Navigate to the tests/new/binaryWarnings/.. directory.
3. Run the provided code to encounter the issue.
4. Observe the declare warning messages and note the incorrect format of the source path.
